1,Add and Delete Employee in HR Portal,"Login to the HR portal, add a new employee, search for the employee, and delete the employee from the list.","Step 1: Navigate to /web/index.php/auth/login
Step 2: Click on div LoginCredentials
Step 3: Log in to the HR portal using credentials

column2: - Step 1: Enter input value in input Username
- Step 4: Enter input value in input Password

column1: Step 4: Add a new employee in the HR portal

column2: - Step 1: Click on link PIM -> Navigate to page '/web/index.php/pim/viewEmployeeList'
- Step 2: Click on link AddEmployee -> Navigate to page '/web/index.php/pim/addEmployee'
- Step 4: Enter input value in input FirstName
- Step 6: Enter input value in input MiddleName
- Step 8: Enter input value in input LastName

column1: Step 5: Click on link EmployeeList -> Navigate to page '/web/index.php/pim/viewEmployeeList'
Step 6: Click on input HintSearch
Step 7: Enter input value in input HintSearch
Step 8: Click on button Search
Step 9: Click on button Action
Step 10: Click on button YesDelete -> Navigate to page ''
Step 11: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
